title: Strengthening Collaborative Inquiry Skills Through VR-Based Online Cultural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Developing educational design competencies reflecting cultural diversity in mathematical education contexts for pre-service/in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design educational scenarios applying social constructivist principles while simulating cross-cultural interactions in VR environments.
Learners can develop educational materials integrating cultural contexts into mathematical problem-solving through collaborative inquiry.
Learners can create cultural education project deliverables with peers using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, metaverse platforms) in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
